title: sans serif brush style font
content:
I know I've seen this before. I'm on a deadline and need to recreate this. Need help with both fonts actually. Can anyone help me out?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020132541im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Agricoat_5469.jpg)
author: eroc816

comments.content:
The brush script is [Cascade](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020132541/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/cascade+script/fonts/).  
The sans serif is [Clearface Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020132541/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/clearface+gothic).
Thank you so much. You just saved me a bunch of time.
